participant_1.background:
I love doing zumba to get my heart rate up and feel younger.
i favorite brand of clothing is donna karen.
I like to organize my home and surroundings to keep busy on the weekends.
I have a rocking chair that I like to sit in while reading to my children.
I am not rich, but I am working hard to achieve my financial goals.

participant_2.background:
I treasure my dog, Petrucci, more than anything else.
I'd brag about my ability to maintain my sanity in the face of the madness that is Toronto summer.
i work in accounting.
i play many instruments.
I've been fortunate to have a close-knit family my whole life.

content.text: Hi there!
Hey there! How's your day going?
It's going well! I just got back from doing some Zumba. How's yours going?
Mine is going well too! I just got back from work. What do you like about Zumba?
I love how it gets my heart rate up and helps me feel younger. I also like the music and the atmosphere.
That's great! I've always wanted to try it, but I'm not sure if I'm fit enough.
You should definitely give it a try! It's a lot of fun and it's a great workout.
Maybe I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
You're welcome! What do you do for work?
I'm an accountant. It can be a lot of work, but it's rewarding.
That's great! I'm sure you're good at it.
Thanks! I try my best!
Do you have any hobbies?
I play a lot of instruments and I love to spend time with my family.
That's awesome! I love to play music too.
What kind of instruments do you play?
I play piano and guitar.
That's great! I play guitar, piano, and saxophone.
Wow! We have a lot in common!
It looks like we do!
Maybe we should get together sometime and play music together!
That would be fun! I'd love to do that
